sentences.english: Hi, Kelly. How are you?
You must all listen carefully.
sentences.chinese: 你们大家都必须仔细听着。

sentences.english: I have some news for you.
sentences.chinese: 我有一些消息要告诉你们。

sentences.english: The letter is addressed to both of you.
Did Robin give you the money?
Only you can make this decision.
sentences.chinese: 只有你才能作这个决定。

sentences.english: You idiot!
You boys have got to learn to behave yourselves.
sentences.chinese: 你们这些男孩子必须学着规矩点。

sentences.english: Hey, you over there! Get out of the way!

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a person or group of people when speaking or writing to them

detailed_translations.chinese: (You)人名；(柬)尤；(东南亚国家华语)猷

sentences.english: a primary school teacher

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to teach, especially in a school

name: hello
trans: n. 表示问候， 惊奇或唤起注意时的用语

sentences.english: Hello, John! How are you?
Stanley, come and say hello to your nephew.
sentences.chinese: 斯坦利，过来和你的侄子打声招呼。

sentences.english: Well, hello there ! I haven’t seen you for ages.

detailed_translations.english: used as a greeting when you see or meet someone

detailed_translations.chinese: 表示问候， 惊奇或唤起注意时的用语

sentences.english: You should keep in with your colleagues.
sentences.chinese: 你应当与你的同事友好相处。

sentences.english: You should not deprecate your own worth.
sentences.chinese: 你不应该贬低你自己的价值。

name: hi
trans: int. 嗨！（表示问候或用以唤起注意）

sentences.english: Hi! How are you?
Hi there! I haven’t seen you for ages.

detailed_translations.chinese: 嗨！（表示问候或用以唤起注意）
detailed_translations.english: hello

name: hello
trans: n. 表示问候， 惊奇或唤起注意时的用语

sentences.english: Hello, John! How are you?
Stanley, come and say hello to your nephew.
sentences.chinese: 斯坦利，过来和你的侄子打声招呼。

sentences.english: Well, hello there ! I haven’t seen you for ages.

detailed_translations.english: used as a greeting when you see or meet someone

detailed_translations.chinese: 表示问候， 惊奇或唤起注意时的用语

name: name
trans: n. 名称，名字；姓名；名誉
vt. 命名，任命；指定；称呼；提名；叫出
adj. 姓名的；据以取名的

sentences.english: Her name is Mandy Wilson.
sentences.chinese: 她的名字是曼迪•威尔逊。

sentences.english: What’s your name?
He didn’t want to do anything to damage the good name of the company.
sentences.chinese: 他不想做任何有损公司良好声誉的事。

sentences.english: They’re a lot better than some airlines I could name.
sentences.chinese: 他们比我叫得上名字的一些航空公司要好得多。

detailed_translations.english: what someone is called
to say what the name of someone or something is, especially officially

sentences.english: Jerry, this is my friend Sue.
She’s always out with her friends.
sentences.chinese: 她常同朋友们一起出去。

sentences.english: One of her closest friends died at the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 她的一位密友周末过世了。

sentences.english: I met Jim through a friend.
sentences.chinese: 经一位朋友介绍，我认识了吉姆。

detailed_translations.english: someone who you know and like very much and enjoy spending time with

name: pupil
trans: n. 学生；[解剖] 瞳孔；未成年人

sentences.english: About 20 pupils study music here.
sentences.chinese: 大约20名小学生在这里学习音乐。

sentences.english: staff and pupils
a star pupil
a third-grade pupil

detailed_translations.english: someone who is being taught, especially a child

sentences.english: He took my hand in his.

detailed_translations.english: of or belonging to him

name: her
trans: pron. 她（she的宾格）；她的（she的所有格）；她（指某个国家；一艘船）

sentences.english: Jane? I don’t really know her.
Margaret wants me to go with her.
sentences.chinese: 玛格丽特想让我和她一起去。

sentences.english: Give her the keys.
Her room was pleasant and airy.
sentences.chinese: 她的房间既舒适又通风。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about
belonging to or connected with a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned

name: pencil
trans: vt. 用铅笔写；用眉笔涂

sentences.english: a sharp pencil
a blue pencil
a pencil sketch

detailed_translations.english: an instrument that you use for writing or drawing, consisting of a wooden stick with a thin piece of a black or coloured substance in the middle
to write something or make a mark with a pencil

name: pencil box
trans: 铅笔盒；文具盒；你的铅笔盒

sentences.english: Put the pen and pencil in the pencil box.
sentences.chinese: 把钢笔和铅笔放在文具盒里。

sentences.english: In 1900, a father gave a pencil box for Christmas, and the child was all smiles.
sentences.chinese: 1900年，父亲给孩子一个铅笔盒当做圣诞礼物，孩子们欢天喜地。

sentences.english: Look, there is a pencil box and a pile of notebooks. There are still many books in it, Chinese book, maths book and English book.
sentences.chinese: 瞧，里面有铅笔盒，笔记本，还有好多好多的书，语文、数学、英语。

name: what
trans: adv. 到什么程度，在哪一方面

sentences.english: Show me what you bought.
What he did was morally wrong.

detailed_translations.english: the thing which

sentences.english: a ballpoint pen
a felt-tip pen
a pen and ink drawing

detailed_translations.english: an instrument for writing or drawing with ink

name: ruler
trans: n. 尺；统治者；[测] 划线板，划线的人

sentences.english: a 12-inch ruler

detailed_translations.chinese: 尺；统治者；[测] 划线板，划线的人
detailed_translations.english: someone such as a king or queen who has official power over a country or area

name: crayon
trans: vt. 以蜡笔作画，用颜色粉笔画

sentences.english: He coloured the picture with crayon.
They send letters — one time in crayon — detailing their rights and how I am violating some maritime treaty from the 1700s.
sentences.chinese: 他们寄信，有一次甚至是蜡笔写的，详细的描述了他们的权利和我如何违反了某些1700年代的海上条约。

detailed_translations.english: a stick of coloured  wax  or  chalk  that children use to draw pictures

detailed_translations.chinese: 以蜡笔作画，用颜色粉笔画
detailed_translations.english: to draw something with a crayon

sentences.english: So who are your real friends and whose real friends are you?
sentences.chinese: 而谁是你的真正的朋友，你又是谁的真正的朋友呢？

sentences.english: That’s the man whose house has burned down. ＃
sentences.chinese: 就是那个男人的房子被烧毁了。

detailed_translations.english: used to ask which person or people a particular thing belongs to

sentences.english: He chalked out a design on the blackboard.
sentences.chinese: 他用粉笔在黑板上勾划出一个图样。

sentences.english: She rubbed the exercises off the blackboard after class.
sentences.chinese: 下课后她把习题从黑板上擦掉。

sentences.english: The teacher knocked on the blackboard to catch our attention.
sentences.chinese: 老师敲了敲黑板以引起我们的注意。

detailed_translations.english: a board with a dark smooth surface, used in schools for writing on with  chalk

name: desk
trans: n. 办公桌；服务台；编辑部；（美）讲道台；乐谱架
adj. 书桌的；桌上用的；伏案做的

sentences.english: Marie was sitting at her desk.

detailed_translations.english: a piece of furniture like a table, usually with drawers in it, that you sit at to write and work

name: chair
trans: n. 椅子；讲座；（会议的）主席位；大学教授的职位
vt. 担任（会议的）主席；使…入座；使就任要职

sentences.english: a kitchen chair
They bought a new table and chairs.
sentences.chinese: 他们买了一套新的桌椅。

sentences.english: One of the chair legs was broken.
Address your questions to the chair, please.
sentences.chinese: 请向主席提出你的问题。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of furniture for one person to sit on, which has a back, a seat, and four legs

sentences.english: She ran back to the classroom to get her schoolbag.
I was straightening my schoolbag when you phoned me.
sentences.chinese: 你给我打电话时，我正在整理书包。

sentences.english: Mom, could you buy me a new green leather schoolbag?
sentences.chinese: 妈妈，你能为我买一个新的绿色皮书包吗？

detailed_translations.english: A schoolbag is a bag that children use to carry books and other things to and from school

sentences.english: He supplements his regular meals by eating between meals.
sentences.chinese: 他在两餐之间吃点东西来补充正餐。

sentences.english: The object of these experiments was to find the connection, if any, between the two phenomena.
sentences.chinese: 这些实验的目的就是探索这两种现象之间的联系，如果存在着任何联系的话。

name: beside
trans: prep. 在旁边；与…相比；和…无关

sentences.english: Wendy came up and sat beside me.
sentences.chinese: 温迪走过来，坐在我身边。

sentences.english: the table beside the bed
I was standing right beside her at the time.
sentences.chinese: 当时我就站在她的旁边。

detailed_translations.english: next to or very close to the side of someone or something

sentences.english: The place was built as a casino in the forties.
sentences.chinese: 这个地方建于20世纪40年代，起初是一座赌场。

detailed_translations.english: the number 40

name: fifty
trans: n. 五十；五十个；编号为50的东西
adj. 五十的；五十个的；众多的

sentences.english: Standards of living rose in the fifties.

detailed_translations.english: the number 50

sentences.english: sixty years ago

detailed_translations.english: the number

name: seventy
trans: n. 七十；七十个；七十岁；七十年代
adj. 七十的；七十个的；七十岁的

sentences.english: We lost touch during the seventies.
sentences.chinese: 我们在70年代失去了联系。

detailed_translations.chinese: 七十；七十个；七十岁；七十年代
detailed_translations.english: the number 70

detailed_translations.chinese: 七十的；七十个的；七十岁的

detailed_translations.english: the number 70

name: eighty
trans: n. 八十；八十岁；八十年代
adj. 八十的，八十个的；八十岁的

sentences.english: The band was incredibly successful in the eighties.
sentences.chinese: 这支乐队在80年代红透半边天。

detailed_translations.english: the number 80

detailed_translations.chinese: 八十的，八十个的；八十岁的

detailed_translations.english: the number 80

sentences.english: America was far richer in the nineties.

detailed_translations.english: the number 90
the number 90

sentences.english: I turned to speak to the person standing behind me.
sentences.chinese: 我转身和站在我后面的那人说话。

sentences.english: Someone could easily creep up behind us.
sentences.chinese: 很可能有人跟在我们后面。

sentences.english: The car behind was hooting impatiently.
sentences.chinese: 后面那辆车不耐烦地按着喇叭。

sentences.english: Jane shut the door behind her.
The manager was sitting behind a large desk.
sentences.chinese: 经理坐在一张大办公桌的后面。

detailed_translations.english: at or towards the back of a thing or person

name: he
trans: n. 男孩，男人；它（雄性动物）

sentences.english: ‘Where’s Paul?’ ‘He’s gone to the cinema.’
It was he who first suggested the idea.
sentences.chinese: 是他先提出这个想法的。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a man, boy, or male animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about

name: she
trans: pron. 她（主格）；它（用来指雌性动物或国家、船舶、地球、月亮等）

sentences.english: You could always ask Beth – she’s got plenty of money.
sentences.chinese: 你总是可以去问贝丝——她有很多钱。

sentences.english: I saw you talking to that girl. Who is she?
sentences.chinese: 我看见你和那个女孩子说话。 她是谁？

sentences.english: What did she say when you told her?

detailed_translations.chinese: 她（主格）；它（用来指雌性动物或国家、船舶、地球、月亮等）
detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about
used to refer to a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about

sentences.english: I hope I’ll have finished the work by the end of the month.
sentences.chinese: 我希望我这个月底能完成工作。

sentences.english: She earns about £350 a month (= each month ).
We update the schedule at least once a month.
sentences.chinese: 我们至少每月更新一次日程表。

detailed_translations.english: one of the 12 named periods of time that a year is divided into

name: May
trans: aux. 可以，能够；可能，也许；祝，愿；会，能

sentences.english: Graduation ceremonies are held in early May.

detailed_translations.english: the fifth month of the year, between April and June

name: rain
trans: vt. 大量地给；使大量落下

sentences.english: a night of wind and rain
There will be heavy rain in most parts of the country.
sentences.chinese: 全国大部分地区将有大雨。

sentences.english: Outside it was still raining.

detailed_translations.english: water that falls in small drops from clouds in the sky
if it rains, drops of water fall from clouds in the sky

sentences.english: The sky was blue and the sun was shining.

detailed_translations.english: the large bright object in the sky that gives us light and heat, and around which the Earth moves
to sit or lie outside when the sun is shining

name: hot
trans: adj. 热的；辣的；热情的；激动的；紧迫的

sentences.english: a hot day in July
a hot curry

detailed_translations.english: something that is hot has a high temperature - used about weather, places, food, drink, or objects

name: snow
trans: vt. 使纷纷落下；使变白

sentences.english: Snow was falling heavily as we entered the village.
sentences.chinese: 我们进村的时候雪下得正大。

sentences.english: I could see footprints in the snow.
The town was buried under three feet of snow.
sentences.chinese: 小镇被三英尺厚的积雪覆盖着。

detailed_translations.english: soft white pieces of frozen water that fall from the sky in cold weather and cover the ground
if it snows, snow falls from the sky

name: cold
trans: adj. 寒冷的；冷淡的，不热情的；失去知觉的

sentences.english: She splashed her face with cold water.
a blast of cold air
We slept on the cold ground.
The house felt cold and empty.
sentences.chinese: 屋子里感觉很冷，空荡荡的。

sentences.english: Martin was really cold towards me at the party.
sentences.chinese: 马丁在聚会上对我非常冷淡。

sentences.english: I was shivering with cold.

detailed_translations.english: something that is cold has a low temperature
a low temperature or cold weather

sentences.english: How do you spell your name?
How can I help you?
I’d like to help in some way, but I’m not sure how.
sentences.chinese: 我想帮点忙，可不知道该怎么做。

sentences.english: He explained how the system worked.
sentences.chinese: 他讲解了该系统是如何运转的。

sentences.english: We both used to work at the airport – that’s how we met.
sentences.chinese: 我们俩都曾经在机场工作过，我们就是这么认识的。

sentences.english: advice on how best (= the best way ) to invest your money
sentences.chinese: 如何以最好方式进行投资的建议

sentences.english: They had a number of suggestions as to how the service could be improved.
sentences.chinese: 他们有一些关于如何改进服务的建议。

sentences.english: This still leaves the question of how local services should be funded.
sentences.chinese: 这仍然没有解决如何为地方公共服务业提供资金的问题。

sentences.english: How many kids do they have now?

detailed_translations.english: used to ask or talk about the way in which something happens or is done

name: weather
trans: n. 天气；气象；气候；处境
vt. 经受住；使风化；侵蚀；使受风吹雨打
vi. 风化；受侵蚀；经受风雨

sentences.english: What’s the weather like today?
The weather turned bitterly cold.

detailed_translations.english: the temperature and other conditions such as sun, rain, and wind

detailed_translations.chinese: 经受住；使风化；侵蚀；使受风吹雨打
detailed_translations.english: if rock, wood, or someone’s face is weathered by the wind, sun, rain etc, or if it weathers, it changes colour or shape over a period of time

name: sunny
trans: adj. 阳光充足的，和煦的；快活的；性情开朗的

sentences.english: a warm sunny day
a sunny morning
a nice sunny room
I hope it’s sunny tomorrow.

detailed_translations.chinese: 阳光充足的，和煦的；快活的；性情开朗的
detailed_translations.english: having a lot of light from the sun

name: warm
trans: vt. 使…兴奋；使…温暖；使…感兴趣

sentences.english: The house was lovely and warm.
I hope we get some warm weather soon.
sentences.chinese: 我希望天气很快就会回暖。

sentences.english: I’ve put your dinner in the oven to keep it warm.
sentences.chinese: 我把你的饭菜放进了烤箱里保温。

sentences.english: warm water

detailed_translations.english: slightly hot, especially in a pleasant way
to make someone or something warm or warmer, or to become warm or warmer

name: cloudy
trans: adj. 多云的；阴天的；愁容满面的

sentences.english: a cloudy night with some light rain
sentences.chinese: 伴有些许小雨的多云的夜晚

sentences.english: Tomorrow, it will be cloudy and cool.

detailed_translations.english: a cloudy sky, day etc is dark because there are a lot of clouds

name: windy
trans: adj. 多风的，有风的；腹胀的；吹牛的

sentences.english: It’s too windy for a picnic.
a cold, windy day
a windy hillside

detailed_translations.chinese: 多风的，有风的；腹胀的；吹牛的
detailed_translations.english: if it is windy, there is a lot of wind

name: cool
trans: adj. 凉爽的；冷静的；出色的
vt. 使…冷却；使…平静下来

sentences.english: She swam out into the cool water.
sentences.chinese: 她往外游向清凉的水里。

sentences.english: The evening air was cool.
Relax in the sun with a cool drink.
sentences.chinese: 在阳光下喝杯清凉饮料放松一下。

sentences.english: the cooler weather of September

detailed_translations.english: low in temperature, but not cold, often in a way that feels pleasant
to make something slightly colder, or to become slightly colder
a temperature that is pleasantly cold
used to tell someone to stop being angry, violent etc

sentences.english: You have made me what I am.
sentences.chinese: 你使我成了我现在这个样子。

sentences.english: I cannot express to you how grateful I am.
sentences.chinese: 我无法向你表达我是多么感激。

sentences.english: I fear I am late.

detailed_translations.chinese: 调频，调谐，调幅（ amplitude modulation）

detailed_translations.english: the first person singular of the present tense of the verb  be

detailed_translations.chinese: （与v-ing连用构成现在进行时，与v-ed连用构成被动语态）

name: when
trans: conj. 考虑到；既然；当…时；在…时；如果
n. 时间，时候；日期；场合
adv. 什么时候，何时；（用于时间的表达方式之后）在那时；其时；当时

sentences.english: When are we leaving?
When did you first meet Dr Darnall?
sentences.chinese: 你是什么时候认识达纳尔博士的？

sentences.english: When will the work be finished?
sentences.chinese: 这项工作什么时候完成？

sentences.english: I don’t know when I’ll see her again.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道何时才能再见到她。

detailed_translations.chinese: 考虑到；既然；当…时；在…时；如果
什么时候，何时；（用于时间的表达方式之后）在那时；其时；当时
detailed_translations.english: at what time

name: birthday
trans: n. 生日，诞辰；诞生的日子

sentences.english: It’s my birthday on Monday.
My aunt called to wish me a happy birthday.
sentences.chinese: 我姑妈打电话来祝我生日快乐。

sentences.english: The City of Cleveland Orchestra is celebrating its 200th birthday.
sentences.chinese: 克利夫兰市管弦乐队正在庆祝乐队成立200周年。

detailed_translations.english: the day in each year which is the same date as the one on which you were born

name: tall
trans: adj. 高的；长的；过分的；夸大的

sentences.english: He was young and tall.
a house surrounded by tall trees
This bush grows tall very quickly.
sentences.chinese: 这种灌木很快就能长高。

detailed_translations.chinese: 高的；长的；过分的；夸大的
detailed_translations.english: a person, building, tree etc that is tall is a greater height than normal

detailed_translations.chinese: (Tall)人名；(马里、阿拉伯)塔勒；(芬、罗、瑞典)塔尔；(英)托尔；(土)塔勒

name: live
trans: adj. 活的；生动的；实况转播的；精力充沛的

sentences.english: He lives just across the street from me.
We live only a few miles from the coast.
sentences.chinese: 我们住的地方离海边只有几英里远。

sentences.english: A rather odd family came tolive next door to us.
sentences.chinese: 有一户相当奇怪的人家搬到了我们隔壁。

sentences.english: As soon as I saw the place, I knew I didn’t want to live there.
sentences.chinese: 我一看到那地方，就觉得不想住在那儿。

sentences.english: Does Paul stilllive here?
We’re still looking for somewhere to live.
They’ve finally found a place to live.
sentences.chinese: 他们终于找到了住的地方。

sentences.english: Most seventeen-year-olds still live at home(= live with their parents ).
sentences.chinese: 17 岁的孩子大都还住在家里。

sentences.english: I’m quite happy living alone.
The house has 3,600 square feet of living space(= the areas of a house you live in ).
sentences.chinese: 这房子有3,600平方英尺的居住空间。

detailed_translations.english: if you live in a place, you have your home there
not dead or artificial

name: too
trans: adv. 太；也；很；还；非常；过度

sentences.english: Do you think the music’s too loud?
You’ve put too much salt in the soup.
There are too many cars on the road.

detailed_translations.english: more than is acceptable or possible

sentences.english: My foot hurts.
I had blisters on the soles of my feet .
I dropped a glass earlier, so don’t walk around in bare feet .
sentences.chinese: 我刚才打破了一个玻璃杯，所以不要光着脚到处走。

sentences.english: The vet examined the horse’s hind feet .
He walked to the foot of the stairs.
He’s six feet tall , with blonde hair.
sentences.chinese: 他身高六英尺，一头金发。

detailed_translations.english: the part of your body that you stand on and walk on

name: on foot
trans: na. 步行；在进行中；徒步

sentences.english: He vainly hope to travel round the world on foot.
I missed the regular bus, so I had to go to work on foot.
sentences.chinese: 早上没赶上班车，没奈何只好步行去上班。

sentences.english: He continues up the mountain on foot, in the snow and sleet, and he's getting sick from the cold.
sentences.chinese: 在冰雨的天气里，他继续步行朝着山上前进，因为天气寒冷，他开始变得不舒服了。

name: by
trans: prep. 通过；被；依据；经由；在附近；在……之前
adv. 通过；经过；附近；[互联网] 白俄罗斯的国家代码顶级域名

sentences.english: She stood by the window.
I was attacked by a dog.
a church designed by the famous architect, Sir Christopher Wren
sentences.chinese: 著名建筑师克里斯托弗·雷恩爵士设计的一座教堂

sentences.english: We are all alarmed by the rise in violent crime.
sentences.chinese: 我们都对暴力罪案的增加感到忧虑。

sentences.english: interference by the state in the affairs of the Church
sentences.chinese: 国家对教会事务的干预

sentences.english: his appointment by the BBC as a producer
sentences.chinese: 英国广播公司委任他为制片人

detailed_translations.english: beside or near something

name: favourite
trans: n. 特别喜爱的人（或物）

sentences.english: a child’s favourite toy
What’s your favourite colour?
a favorite spot for picnickers

detailed_translations.english: your favourite person or thing is the one that you like the most
something that you like more than other things of the same kind

name: colour
trans: n. 颜色；风格；气色，面色；外貌
vt. 把…涂颜色，粉饰；歪曲；使脸红

sentences.english: Her eyes suddenly met his and she coloured slightly.
sentences.chinese: 她的目光突然和他相遇，她微微有点脸红了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 把…涂颜色，粉饰；歪曲；使脸红
detailed_translations.english: when someone colours, their face becomes redder because they are embarrassed

detailed_translations.chinese: 颜色；风格；气色，面色；外貌
detailed_translations.english: red, blue, yellow, green, brown, purple etc

name: brown
trans: adj. 棕色的，褐色的；太阳晒黑的

sentences.english: This particular model is available in brown, white, or grey.
sentences.chinese: 这个型号的产品有棕色、白色和灰色的。

sentences.english: the browns and greens of the landscape

detailed_translations.english: the colour of earth, wood, or coffee

name: blue
trans: adj. 蓝色的；沮丧的，忧郁的；下流的
n. 蓝色；[复数]（美国海、陆、空三军穿的）蓝色制服；蓝颜料；[the blue(s)][用作单数或复数]布鲁斯（歌曲）（一种伤感的美国黑人民歌
vt. 把…染成蓝色；使成蓝色；给…用上蓝剂；用上蓝剂于

sentences.english: the blue waters of the lake
She nearly always dresses in blue.
sentences.chinese: 她几乎总是穿蓝色的衣服。

detailed_translations.english: having the colour of the sky or the sea on a fine day
the colour of the sky or the sea on a fine day

sentences.english: What sort of clothes was he wearing?
I showered and put on clean clothes.
sentences.chinese: 我淋浴后穿上干净的衣服。

sentences.english: He was still in his work clothes.
a clothes shop

detailed_translations.english: the things that people wear to cover their body or keep warm

sentences.english: They partook of our triumph.
She spread our lunch on the grass.
sentences.chinese: 她在草地上摆好了我们的午饭。

sentences.english: We avenged ourselves on  our enemy.
sentences.chinese: 我们向我们的敌人报仇。

name: their
trans: pron. 他们的，她们的；它们的

sentences.english: They have their compensations.
My pulses, her pulses, their pulses.
sentences.chinese: 我的脉搏，她的脉搏，他们的脉搏。

sentences.english: In America, they go out with their friends.
sentences.chinese: 在美国，他们与他们的朋友出去。

name: subject
trans: n. 主题；科目；[语] 主语；国民
adj. 服从的；易患…的；受制于…的

sentences.english: Paul has strong opinions on most subjects.
sentences.chinese: 保罗在大多数问题上观点激烈。

sentences.english: The subjects covered in this chapter are exercise and nutrition.
sentences.chinese: 本章涵盖的主题是运动和营养。

detailed_translations.chinese: 题目； 学科； 主语
detailed_translations.english: the thing you are talking about or considering in a conversation, discussion, book, film etc
to force a country or group of people to be ruled by you, and control them very strictly

name: Chinese
trans: adj. 中国的，中国人的；中国话的

sentences.english: Do you fancy going out for a Chinese?
sentences.chinese: 你想不想出去吃顿中餐？

detailed_translations.english: relating to China, its people, or its language
people from China

name: English
trans: n. 英语；英国人；英文；英格兰人
adj. 英国人的；英国的；英文的

sentences.english: Do you speak English?
leaflets written in plain English
the English countryside

detailed_translations.english: the language used in Britain, the US, Australia, and some other countries
relating to England or its people

name: science
trans: n. 科学；技术；学科；理科

sentences.english: Many leading scientists do not consider that science can give absolutely reliable knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 许多杰出科学家都不认为科学能够提供绝对可靠的知识。

sentences.english: the founder of modern science, Isaac Newton
sentences.chinese: 现代科学创始人艾萨克·牛顿

sentences.english: developments in science and technology

detailed_translations.english: knowledge about the world, especially based on examining, testing, and proving facts

sentences.english: Tim’s good at math and science.
sentences.chinese: 蒂姆的数学和自然科学很好。

sentences.english: a set of simple math problems
She’s learning calculus in math class.
a math test

detailed_translations.english: mathematics

name: PE
trans: abbr. 体育课，体能训练（physical education）

sentences.english: the Museum of Modern Art in New York
an example of early Indian art
Television is ruining the art of conversation.

detailed_translations.english: the use of painting, drawing,  sculpture  etc to represent things or express ideas

sentences.english: I often listen to classic music when I’m in the car.
sentences.chinese: 我在车上经常听古典音乐。

sentences.english: A new piece of music was specially written for the occasion.
sentences.chinese: 为了这个活动专门写了一首新曲子。

sentences.english: I left my music at home.

detailed_translations.english: a series of sounds made by instruments or voices in a way that is pleasant or exciting

name: and
trans: conj. 和，与；就；而且；但是；然后

sentences.english: He’s gone to get some fish and chips.
The film starred Jack Lemmon and Shirley Maclaine.
sentences.chinese: 这部电影由杰克·莱蒙和雪莉·麦克莱恩主演。

sentences.english: We’ve dealt with items one, two, and eleven.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经处理了第一项、第二项和第十一项。

sentences.english: He was tall, dark, and handsome.
sentences.chinese: 他身材高大、皮肤黝黑，相貌英俊。

sentences.english: He plays the guitar and sings folk songs.
I missed supper and I’m starving!
sentences.chinese: 我没吃晚饭，现在饿极了！

detailed_translations.english: used to join two words, phrases etc referring to things that are related in some way

sentences.english: It’s an old car, but it’s very reliable.
sentences.chinese: 这是一辆旧车，但是性能非常可靠。

sentences.english: They rushed to the hospital, but they were too late.
sentences.chinese: 他们急忙赶到医院，但是已经太迟了。

sentences.english: We’ve invited the boss, but she may decide not to come.
sentences.chinese: 我们邀请过老板，但她有可能决定不来。

sentences.english: an expensive but extremely useful book
sentences.chinese: 价钱很贵却是非常有用的一本书

sentences.english: ‘Has he got any experience?’ ‘No, but he’s keen to learn.’
sentences.chinese: “他有经验吗？”“没有，但他非常好学。”

detailed_translations.english: used to connect two statements or phrases when the second one adds something different or seems surprising after the first one
